tsa 3p irr neutralizers.enriched_query:
1. **Enriched Procurement Query**:
- Seeking suppliers for "Tryptic Soy Agar (TSA) with 3-Part Irradiated (IRR) Neutralizers".
- Intended use: **Not specified** (please specify if for environmental monitoring, sterility testing, validation, etc.).
- Format/packaging: **Not specified** (please specify plate size, volume, or other format preferences if known).
- Quantity requirement: **Not specified**.
- Product should contain triple neutralizers (commonly lecithin, polysorbate 80, and sodium thiosulfate) and must be irradiated to achieve sterility assurance.
- Must be compliant with relevant pharmacopeial standards (e.g., USP, EP, JP) – **open, unless specified**.
- Certificate of Analysis (CoA) and sterility documentation preferred.
- Alternate names/synonyms: "Tryptic Soy Agar with Neutralizers", "Irradiated TSA 3N", "TSA 3-Component Neutralizing Agar", "TSA with Lecithin/Polysorbate/Sodium Thiosulfate", "TSA neutralizing media irradiated".
- Please provide catalog numbers and technical data sheets if available.

2. **Key Comparison Attributes**:
- **Sterilization Method** (gamma irradiation confirmation and certificate)
- **Type and concentration of neutralizers** (lecithin, polysorbate 80, sodium thiosulfate; exact formulation)
- **Regulatory compliance/certifications** (pharmacopeial conformity, GMP, CoA availability)
- **Packaging/format** (plates, bottles, tubes; size and quantity per pack)
- **Shelf life and storage conditions**

vendors.product_description: Ready-to-use contact plates (55 mm) of Tryptic Soy Agar with neutralizers (lecithin, polysorbate 80 (Tween®), sodium thiosulfate, L-histidine); gamma-irradiated and triple-wrapped; pack of 10 plates (10 plates/triple pack)
vendors.packaging_format: 55 mm contact plates, triple-wrapped; 10 plates per pack ([www.merckmillipore.com](https://www.merckmillipore.com/GE/en/product/mm/146231#:~:text=packaging))
vendors.storage_condition: Protect from light; keep loosely closed and dry ([www.merckmillipore.com](https://www.merckmillipore.com/GE/en/product/mm/146231#:~:text=protect%20from%20light%20,closed%20and%20dry))

vendors.product_description: Triple-wrapped sterile pack of Tryptic Soy Agar (55 mm plates) with neutralizers (lecithin, polysorbate 80, sodium thiosulfate, L-histidine) and a VHP indicator; 100 plates per pack (with 2D barcode)

hyaluronids activty elisa-k-6000-5x96 wl.enriched_query:
1. **Enriched Procurement Query**:

- Seeking suppliers for "Hyaluronidase Activity ELISA Kit," specifically referencing the catalog number ELISA-K-6000 (also search for synonyms such as "Hyaluronidase Activity Assay Kit" or "Hyaluronidase ELISA Kit").
- Kit size/package: 5 x 96-well plates per kit (total 480 wells).
- Intended application: Detection and quantification of hyaluronidase enzyme activity using ELISA methodology (quantitative enzyme activity measurement).
- Require details on sensitivity, detection range, and sample compatibility (e.g., serum, plasma, tissue, cell lysates—mark as "not specified" if not in original query).
- Certification/validation: Research use only (RUO) or clinical use—please specify (not specified in the query).
- Please provide lead time, shipping/storage conditions (cold chain required?), and expiration/shelf life.
- Alternate product names: "Hyaluronidase Activity ELISA Kit", "Hyaluronidase Activity Quantification Kit", "Hyaluronidase Assay 5 x 96-well".

2. **Key Comparison Attributes**:

- Format and size of the kit (e.g., number of 96-well plates per kit)
- Sensitivity and detection range of the assay
- Sample compatibility (types of samples validated)
- Certification/Validation status (e.g., RUO, CE-IVD, FDA cleared)
- Storage conditions and shelf life

This structured request will facilitate detailed, apples-to-apples comparison across different kit vendors and ensure critical product characteristics are evaluated.

vendors.product_description: Hyaluronidase Inhibitor Screening Assay Kit, MAK458 (100 tests) ([www.sigmaaldrich.com](https://www.sigmaaldrich.com/US/en/product/sigma/mak458#:~:text=Hyaluronidase%20Inhibitor%20Screening%20Assay%20Kit))

e.coli hcdna kits; cat #: 4458435.enriched_query:
1. **Enriched Procurement Query**:

- Seeking suppliers for "E. coli HcDNA Kit" (Catalog Number: 4458435).
- Intended use: [not specified; please indicate if for research, diagnostic, or clinical use].
- Request product information, technical data sheet (TDS), and Certificate of Analysis (CoA), if available.
- Specify contents of the kit, including included reagents and quantities.
- Packaging/size: [not specified; please indicate volume or number of preps if necessary].
- Require information on storage conditions and recommended shelf life.
- Alternate names/synonyms: Please cross-reference as "Escherichia coli HcDNA Extraction Kit," "E. coli High Copy DNA Kit," or similar extraction/purification kits.
- Request information on availability, lead time, and shipping restrictions (temperature, hazard, etc.).
- Regulatory certification or compliance (if required): [open].

2. **Key Comparison Attributes**:

- Kit contents (reagents included and their volumes/number of preps)
- Intended application (research use only, clinical/diagnostic, etc.)
- Storage conditions (temperature, light sensitivity, etc.)
- Shelf life/expiry date
- Certifying documentation (Certificate of Analysis, compliance certifications)

*Note: Always confirm catalog number (4458435) matches across suppliers, as catalog numbers may differ between brands.

pathhunterbioassaykit#93-0933.enriched_query:
1. **Enriched Procurement Query**:

- Sourcing request for: PathHunter Bioassay Kit (Catalog #93-0933)
- Manufacturer: DiscoverX (Eurofins DiscoverX is a common manufacturer for PathHunter assay kits)
- Alternative product names/identifiers: Also known as PathHunter β-Arrestin Assay Kit or PathHunter Bioassay System, depending on application. Please provide cross-references if available.
- Intended use/application: Not specified (open – intended application should be confirmed with the supplier)
- Target/Assay type: Not specified (open – supplier’s product datasheet should confirm the specific assay or detection target of #93-0933)
- Kit size/packaging: Not specified (open – supplier to clarify available pack sizes for #93-0933)
- Certificate of Analysis (COA): Required; ensure batch-specific documentation is available
- Storage conditions: Not specified (open – request supplier to confirm recommended storage, typically refrigerated or frozen for assay kits)
- Grade/purity/format: Research grade assumed unless otherwise specified; confirm with supplier
- Regulatory status: For research use only (RUO), unless otherwise stated
- Delivery timeline and availability: Open
- Synonyms/search expansion: PathHunter Assay Kit, Catalog #93-0933, β-Arrestin Assay Kits, DiscoverX 93-0933, Eurofins DiscoverX PathHunter Kit

2. **Key Comparison Attributes**:
- Assay type/target specificity (verify the exact target and cell type for Kit #93-0933)
- Kit size/number of assays (number of wells or reactions per kit)
- Storage and stability requirements (temperature, shelf life)
- Regulatory grade or certification (Research Use Only, GMP, etc.)
- Price and availability (lead time, stock status)

**Note**: If any specification is not listed in the query, it should be requested as "open" when contacting vendors, with the aim of gathering full product datasheets for comparison.
